name: Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon
text:
Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon + Ancient Dark Magician + Ancient Blue-Eyes White Dragon
This card can only be summoned by fusing the above materials using the effect of "Ancient Power Released". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 "Burst Stream of Destruction" or 1 "Ancient Burst Stream of Destruction"; Banish all monsters your opponent controls. "Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon" can not attack the turn this effect was used. This card is unaffected by card effects. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, target 1 card in your opponent's hand; Banish that card, and if it was a monster gain Life Points equal to half of that monster's ATK.
